title: User Registration and Consent Flow
description: Verify that users can successfully register, provide privacy consent, and configure preferences ensuring GDPR compliance.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user details and submit.
Provide consent for data collection and privacy policy.
Configure user preferences.
Confirm account creation and successful consent recording.
Check that default preferences are saved and editable.

title: Trip Logging via Automatic GPS Detection
description: Validate automatic trip logging triggers at correct trip start and end times with accurate geolocation using Leaflet maps.

steps.description: Enable GPS and start traveling.
Verify trip start is automatically detected and logged with timestamp and geolocation.
Stop traveling.
Verify trip end time is captured and trip is saved correctly.
Check that trip path is correctly visualized on Leaflet map.

title: Manual Trip Entry and Mode Selection
description: Ensure users can manually enter trips with mode (walk, cycle, car, etc.) and purpose correctly selected and saved.

steps.description: Navigate to manual trip entry form.
Input trip details including start/end locations, times.
Select travel mode and trip purpose.
Submit the trip entry.
Confirm the trip is recorded with correct attributes.

title: AI-Powered Mode and Purpose Detection Accuracy
description: Validate that AI correctly classifies trip modes and predicts trip purposes using historical and contextual data.

steps.description: Simulate user trip data with various travel modes and purposes.
Verify that AI mode detection matches expected modes (walk, bike, car, bus, metro).
Verify predicted trip purposes match simulated trip context (work, school, leisure, shopping).

title: User Consent Management and Privacy Enforcement
description: Test that user privacy consents are stored, effectively enforced, and data is anonymized ensuring GDPR compliance.

steps.description: Modify user privacy consent settings.
Verify that data collection behavior changes according to consent.
Check that stored user data is anonymized and inaccessible without consent.

title: Trip Diary Multimedia Upload and Editing
description: Validate that users can upload photos, add notes to trip diary entries, edit them, and export diary content correctly.

steps.description: Open trip diary entry interface.
Upload images and enter text notes for a trip.
Edit uploaded content and save changes.
Export diary data to supported formats.
Verify images and notes are saved and displayed correctly.
Verify exported files contain all diary content accurately.

title: Booking Process for Hotels and Trains
description: Test end-to-end booking workflow for hotel and train reservations including search, selection, confirmation, and error handling.

steps.description: Search for hotels using valid criteria.
Select a hotel and room type.
Proceed to booking confirmation and payment.
Verify booking confirmation details are displayed and stored.
Repeat the above steps for train booking.
Check error handling for invalid bookings or failed provider integration.

title: Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard Visualization
description: Verify analytics dashboard displays accurate timelines, heatmaps, and traffic pattern visuals with real-time data updates.

steps.description: Load analytics dashboard.
Confirm timeline visualizations match trip data.
Check heatmap displays correct geo-locations and intensity.
Validate traffic pattern analytics updates properly with new data.
Export analytics data from the dashboard.
Verify exported reports are complete and correctly formatted.

title: Emergency SOS Alert Trigger and Logging
description: Ensure that SOS alerts can be triggered via the app interface, backend logs the event, and notifications are sent correctly.

steps.description: Trigger Emergency SOS through the app UI.
Verify backend logs the SOS event with correct user and timestamp.
Check notifications or alerts are sent to predefined contacts or services.

title: Gamification Points, Badges, and Leaderboard Updates
description: Validate that user actions correctly award points and badges, and leaderboard rankings update in real-time.

steps.description: Perform activities that earn points and badges, such as logging trips and diary entries.
Confirm points and badges are awarded correctly.
Access leaderboard after updates.
Verify user rankings reflect recent point changes.

title: Offline Support and PWA Functionality
description: Confirm that the application supports offline usage with data persistence and sync upon reconnection via PWA implementation.

steps.description: Access the app with internet connection and cache resources.
Switch device to offline mode.
Interact with core functionalities like viewing trip logs and editing diaries without errors.
Make offline changes such as adding diary entries.
Restore internet connection.
Verify offline changes are synchronized successfully to backend.

title: Companion Travel Logging via Bluetooth Detection
description: Validate that companion tracking accurately detects and logs co-travelers using Bluetooth or detection methods and associates trips accordingly.

steps.description: Enable companion tracking feature and pair Bluetooth devices.
Start a trip with companions present.
Verify companions are detected and linked to the trip.
End the trip.
Confirm companion trip data is saved and visible in travel logs.

title: API Endpoint Authentication and Authorization
description: Ensure all backend API endpoints require valid authentication tokens and enforce authorization rules.

steps.description: Attempt accessing API endpoints without authentication token.
Confirm access is denied with appropriate error response.
Access endpoints with valid authentication token.
Verify access is granted according to user roles and permissions.

title: Error Handling on Booking Service Provider Failures
description: Test system behavior and user notifications when hotel or train booking service providers are unavailable or return errors.

steps.description: Simulate backend booking provider failure during hotel booking.
Verify user sees clear error message and booking is aborted gracefully.
Repeat simulation for train booking.
Ensure no partial bookings occur and error logs are recorded.

title: Data Export Formats and Completeness
description: Validate data export functionality produces complete trip and analytics data in all supported formats without loss or corruption.

steps.description: Request data export in each supported format (e.g., CSV, JSON, PDF).
Verify exported files contain full and accurate trip and analytics details.
Confirm files open successfully in respective applications.

title: Frontend and Backend Integration Stability
description: Perform integration testing to ensure React frontend interacts correctly with Django REST backend services for all key features.

steps.description: Execute typical user flows including login, trip logging, diary updates, booking, and analytics.
Verify data consistency between frontend display and backend storage.
Check for proper response handling and no frontend errors or crashes.

title: Notification System Feedback on User Actions
description: Check that toast notifications correctly appear for success, error, and informational user actions across the application.

steps.description: Perform actions like trip save, booking confirm, diary upload.
Verify that an appropriate toast notification appears each time.
Trigger known error conditions, such as invalid form data.
Confirm error notifications are displayed promptly.
